question: Jab aap class me koi new idea sunte ho, aapka pehla reaction hota hai:
options: Imagine karte ho ki isko alag-alag tareeke se kaise apply kiya jaa sakta hai.
Pehle basic research karte ho, phir opinion banate ho.
Wait karte ho ki dusre kya soch rahe hain, fir bolte ho.
Tabhi consider karte ho jab topic directly subject se related ho.

question: Agar aapke paas group assignment 5 din me submit karna hai, to aap:
options: Task ko checklist me tod ke abhi start karte ho.
Roz thoda-thoda karte ho bina fixed plan ke.
Deadline ke ek din pehle start karte ho.
Group ke dusre members ka wait karte ho.

question: Networking event me aap usually:
options: Naye logon se confidently milte ho aur baat start karte ho.
Sirf unse baat karte ho jinko already jaante ho.
Wait karte ho ki koi pehle aapke paas aaye.
Jab tak zarurat na ho, avoid karte ho.

question: Agar team mate project me galti karta hai, to aap:
options: Politely samjhate ho aur help karte ho fix karne me.
Chupchaap khud correct kar lete ho.
Frustrate hote ho par kuch nahi bolte.
Publicly point out karte ho taaki repeat na ho.

question: Kaam me achanak problem aa jaaye to aap:
options: Calm rehte ho, problem ko steps me tod ke solve karte ho.
Advice lete ho, phir action lete ho.
Stress feel karte ho but try karte ho solve karne ka.
Panic karte ho aur dusron ka wait karte ho.

question: Jab aap kisi se baat karte ho to aap:
options: Dhyan se sunte ho, phir jawab dete ho.
Sunte ho par beech me apna reply sochne lagte ho.
Beech me hi interrupt kar dete ho.
Bas apni baari ka wait karte ho.

question: Agar aapko 5 minute notice me 100 students ke saamne bolne ko bola jaaye, to aap:
options: Accept karke confidently bolte ho.
Accept karte ho but nervous feel karte ho.
Excuse bana ke avoid karte ho.
Seedha refuse kar dete ho.

question: Naye insaan se milte waqt aapka body language hota hai:
options: Open & friendly (eye contact, smile, relaxed posture).
Neutral but polite.
Thoda reserved.
Nervous & awkward.

question: Debate me jab koi aapse strongly disagree karta hai to aap:
options: Calm rehte ho aur logical counter points dete ho.
Apne point defend karte ho bina sunne ke.
Topic change kar dete ho.
Upset hoke chup ho jaate ho.

question: Important decision (jaise career choice) lete waqt aap:
options: Pros & cons list banate ho.
Family & friends se discuss karte ho.
Gut feeling pe chale jaate ho.
Decision delay karte ho.

question: Busy din me agar aapko 3 ghante free mil jaaye to aap:
options: Pending kaam complete karte ho.
Thoda break lete ho, phir kaam.
Pure entertainment me lagate ho.
Waste kar dete ho bina realise kiye.

question: Friend apni personal problem share kare to aap:
options: Dhyan se sunke thoughtful advice dete ho.
Apna similar experience share karte ho.
Mood change karne ki koshish karte ho.
Avoid karte ho deep baatein.

question: College event organise karte waqt aap:
options: Detailed plan banake tasks assign karte ho.
Rough plan banate ho aur adjust karte ho.
Dusron pe planning chhod dete ho.
Responsibility lene se bachte ho.

question: Naye club me join karte ho jahan sab pehle se ek dusre ko jaante hain, to aap:
options: Introduce karke mingle karte ho.
Chup rehte ho jab tak koi baat na kare.
Sirf tab join karte ho jab friend saath ho.
Avoid karte ho.

question: Team member kaam nahi kar raha ho to aap:
options: Motivate karke reason samajhte ho.
Unka kaam kisi aur ko de dete ho.
Ignore karte ho jab tak effect na ho.
Leader ko complaint kar dete ho.

question: Presentation ke beech laptop kaam karna band kar de to aap:
options: Calm rehte ho aur without slides continue karte ho.
Joke maar ke time lete ho fix karne ka.
Sorry bol ke jaldi end kar dete ho.
Flustered ho jaate ho aur points bhool jaate ho.

question: Group discussion me aap:
options: Pehle sunte ho, phir relevant points add karte ho.
Chance milte hi bolte ho.
Sirf tab bolte ho jab pucha jaaye.
Bilkul nahi bolte.

question: Manager tough deadline deta hai to aap:
options: Task break karke important cheeze pehle karte ho.
Extra hours work karke finish karte ho.
Turant extension maang lete ho.
Stress karte ho bina action liye.

question: Koi aapke kaam pe criticism kare to aap:
options: Thank karke improvement points note karte ho.
Sunte ho par defensive feel karte ho.
Strongly justify karte ho.
Ignore kar dete ho.

question: Classmate koi innovative idea share kare to aap:
options: Excited hoke creative input dete ho.
Appreciate karte ho par traditional way pe stick karte ho.
Practicality doubt karte ho.
Discussion avoid karte ho.

question: Apna week organise karte waqt aap:
options: Proper timetable banate ho.
Rough mental plan banate ho.
Din ke hisaab se chalate ho.
Sirf workload zyada hone pe plan banate ho.

question: Crisis me aap:
options: Calm rehte ho aur logically sochte ho.
Dusron se guidance lete ho.
Bina plan ke instant action lete ho.
Wait karte ho ki koi aur lead le.

question: Friendly debate me achanak bulaya jaaye to aap:
options: Confidently participate karte ho.
Nervous hoke participate karte ho.
Escape karne ki koshish karte ho.
Seedha mana kar dete ho.

question: Professionals se milte waqt aapka handshake hota hai:
options: Firm & confident.
Gentle & polite.
Weak & hesitant.
Avoid karte ho.

question: Group project idea pe sab stuck ho jaaye to aap:
options: Creative alternative suggest karte ho.
Original plan pe stick karte ho.
Wait karte ho ki dusre idea laayein.
Leader pe chhod dete ho.

question: Agar achanak free day mil jaaye to aap:
options: Pending kaam complete karte ho.
Half work, half rest karte ho.
Entertainment pe zyada focus karte ho.
Waste kar dete ho bina realise kiye.

question: Kisi ko concept samjhate waqt aap:
options: Examples aur simple language use karte ho.
Sirf definition dete ho.
Fast bolte ho bina check kiye ki samjha ya nahi.
Avoid karte ho explain karna.

question: Team me kaam karte waqt aap:
options: Equal contribution prefer karte ho.
Zarurat ho to leadership lete ho.
Sirf apna part karte ho.
Dusron pe zyada kaam chhod dete ho.

question: Galti hone par aap:
options: Accept karke jaldi fix karte ho.
Hide karte ho jab tak koi notice na kare.
Circumstances ko blame karte ho.
Dusron ko blame karte ho.

question: Exam se pehle stress ho to aap:
options: Calm rehte ho aur step-by-step prepare karte ho.
Zyada padhte ho gap cover karne ke liye.
Overthink karke anxious ho jaate ho.
Stress ki wajah se padhna avoid karte ho.
